TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowCreationContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示在工作流激活过程中使用工作流托管终结点设置的上下文，用于处理自变量和接收工作流完成通知。

span.span: Represents a context that is set up during workflow activation using the workflow hosting endpoint to handle arguments, and receive workflow completion notifications.

span.span: The state of the workflow instance.

param.name: workflowOutputs
param.span: 包含工作流实例生成的输出的键/值对的集合。

span.span: A collection of key/value pairs that contain output generated by the workflow instance.

param.name: terminationException
param.span: 导致工作流终止的错误（如果存在）。

span.span: If present, an error that caused the workflow to terminate.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 必须在此时间内完成异步操作的时间间隔。

span.span: The time interval during which the asynchronous operation must complete.

param.name: callback
param.span: 异步操作完成时将控制权返回到的应用程序中的位置。

span.span: The location in an application to which control returns when the asynchronous operation completes.
User-defined state.

summary.span: 开始异步操作以执行工作流实例完成通知。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to perform workflow instance completion notification.

summary.span: 当与此 关联的工作流实例完成时调用此方法。

span.span: This method is called when the workflow instance associated with this completes.

summary.span: 派生类可覆盖此操作以针对工作流实例的完成事件执行自定义操作。

span.span: Derived classes can override this operation to perform custom actions on workflow instance completion.
The status of the asynchronous operation.
